item.title: Apple launches a black HomePod mini
item.description:
Apple just launched a version of its HomePod mini smart speaker in a new “midnight” color. The new dark color looks very similar to the original space gray that the mini launched in, but the new naming brings it in line with the midnight HomePod 2nd gen that was released early last year. It goes up for sale on July 17th in the US (still for $99) and 31 other countries.

The HomePod mini only launched with two colors — space gray and white — initially, but Apple later added yellow, orange, and blue. Apple says the new mini’s mesh is made with 100 percent recycled mesh. Until now, the smart speaker has used 90 percent recycled material.

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Wes Davis

Seven invite-only deals are live ahead of Prime Day 2024
item.description: Amazon Prime Day is almost here, returning on July 16 and 17, and for the second year in a row, they're bringing back invite-only deals. Here's what's available so far, plus everything else you need to know.

item.title: Hey, insomniacs: Get the award-winning Hatch smart alarm at a record-low price
item.description: In this early Prime Day deal, you can get the Hatch Restore 2 sunrise alarm clock for just $144.99 (reg. $199.99), its lowest-ever price.

item.title: Prime Day 2024 is almost here: 150+ of the best early deals you can shop right now
item.description: Amazon Prime Day 2024 runs from July 16 through 17. Here's what to expect, including the best live deals you can already shop.
